description: A classic Italian dish made with spaghetti, bacon, eggs, and parmesan cheese. Rich and creamy, it's the ultimate comfort food.
A spicy and aromatic Indian curry made with chicken, onions, tomatoes, and a blend of fragrant spices. Served with rice or naan bread.
A hearty Russian dish made with beef, mushrooms, onions, and sour cream. Served over noodles or mashed potatoes.
A classic British dish made with battered fish and deep-fried chips. Served with tartar sauce and a side of peas or mushy peas.
A popular Mexican street food made with marinated pork, pineapple, and cilantro. Served on soft corn tortillas and topped with onion and salsa.
A flavorful Thai dish made with stir-fried rice noodles, shrimp or chicken, tofu, peanuts, bean sprouts, and a tangy sauce. Garnished with lime and cilantro.
